messages.subject: Intro and positive homeschool reaction story
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/19/03 8:44:02 AM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/19/03 8:44:02 AM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<<
Ren your "it finally happened" thread was very helpful. >>

Good.
I think if you're going to go through some stress, it ought to be beneficial
in some way!! :)
And it ended up not being stressful really at all. Lucky for us.

About your positive reaction to homeschooling....I tend to get more of that
now than I did even a mere eight years ago. It is becoming more common and
generally more acceptable in mainstream society now that more homeschoolers
are getting media coverage.
BUT, unschooling is another story. I have yet to get very many good reactions
when I try to describe that!

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett
